Really, one of the best multiplayer games I've played with friends. Looking back on this title I'd have to say that it was executed brilliantly in a way that brought challenging elements together like face paced teamwork with things youre more used to like zombie waves. Learn to aim and don't hog the meds is the name of the game, but if you want to claim the fame then be prepared to TAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAANK!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Been playing since release and I can't put it down
